insert into t_float_coupon (ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_CONFIG_ID, TYPE, TARGET_TYPE, TARGET_ID, TARGET_NAME, BIZ_ID, STATUS, APR_TYPE, APR_YEAR, APR_MONTH, INTEREST, CAPITAL, ACTIVE_USER, ACTIVE_TIME, COUNT_DAYS, EXIT_DATE, VALID_DAYS, END_DATE, REMARK, ADDTIME, ADDUSER, ADDIP, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_USER, LAST_MODIFY_REMARK, PLATFORM, IS_CUSTODY) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aprType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aprYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{aprMonth,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{capital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activeUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{countDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exitDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{validDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastModifyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isCustody,jdbcType=INTEGER})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

update t_float_coupon
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRODUCT_CONFIG_ID = #{productConfigId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_ID = #{targetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_NAME = #{targetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIZ_ID = #{bizId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APR_TYPE = #{aprType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APR_YEAR = #{aprYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APR_MONTH = #{aprMonth,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTEREST = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CAPITAL = #{capital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACTIVE_USER = #{activeUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACTIVE_TIME = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COUNT_DAYS = #{countDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXIT_DATE = #{exitDate,jdbcType=DATE},
VALID_DAYS = #{validDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADDUSER = #{adduser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ADDIP = #{addip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = now(),
LAST_MODIFY_USER = #{lastModifyUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_MODIFY_REMARK = #{lastModifyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_CUSTODY = #{isCustody,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
